subject: Baseball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Among the top prospective picks in baseball’s draft are Stanford pitcher Mark Appel; Byron Buxton, a high school center fielder; and Florida’s Mike Zunino, a slugging catcher.
snippet: Among the top prospective picks in baseball’s draft are Stanford pitcher Mark Appel; Byron Buxton, a high school center fielder; and Florida’s Mike Zunino, a slugging catcher.
